content.description: Start low right, traverse left(lip is off)  and top out when the overhang is done.
content.location: Backside of the boulder opposite the prow

content.description: Sit start just right of The Illustrious Bolton, climb straight up to ledge
content.location: Just right of The Illustrious Bolton

content.description: Start matched on the clean pinch jug protruding around 5 ft high from the slightly chossy section of this boulder. Get some high feet on the slab below and press into the small corner feature out left, grab a sloper straight up and work your feet up until you can top out using a quartz sloper on top of the boulder directly above the start hold.
content.location: This boulder is around the corner from Bread Basket, on the opposite side from the road/ the obvious prow, and is to the left of smooth operator.I'm not sure where this is in relation to el nino as I haven't been able to find that based on the description and lack of photos, although there is a chance that el nino starts on the slopey start-feet of this climb so maybe this is el nino stand start?

content.description: Climb the crack from left to right until the crack runs out then top out.
content.location: Large horizontal crack on face left of prow

content.description: Stand start left hand on an incut crimp just on the left side of the arete and your right hand on a good crimpy edge a couple feet to the right of the arete. Get a couple high feet then reach up to good crimps and incut edges and top out in the weakness up and to the left.
content.location: Starts on the SE arete just past Bread Basket.

content.description: Sit start low right under prow, bump right then left and top out on the left.
content.location: The obvious prow feature, you can't miss it.

content.description: Sit start at the base of the boulder, there are two small crimps at ~knee height that someone can start on for the true low sit start, but from sitting a 5inch pad I can just barely reach two good but small crimps that I'd call a "high sit start" and it felt pretty moderate starting from there. There is a good foot rail out left to use to pull off the ground and bump through crimps and sloping edges before you top out up and right from the start at the top of the small bulge in the center of this face.
content.location: Starts low in the center of the face that has Smooth Operator and faces away from the road. Tops out up and right from the starting holds.

content.description: Sit start on slopers climb to a high jug and drop off.
Sit Start in the crack traverse right under the prow and finish up Ship of Fools
content.location: Starts in crack to the left of the prow

content.description: Sit start on the bread loaf shaped hold climb up and left
content.location: On the face to the right of Ship of Fools look for the bread loaf

content.description: Triangle shaped boulder with prow shaped feature near the road. Close to road so be respectful of neighbors and where you park.
